title: Mundgod wins the 2025 GCM Gold Cup
author: TNSA Media Team
content: Mundgod captured the 2025 GCM Gold Cup after a spirited final showcasing teamwork and discipline.
The match drew supporters from across the Tibetan community, celebrating sportsmanship and unity.

title: CONIFA Men's Asia Cup 2025
author: Press Office
content: Tibet's participation in the CONIFA Men's Asia Cup highlights the continued growth of Tibetan football.
Fixtures and training schedules will be announced as the tournament approaches.

title: Ghoton Cup 2025 London
author: Events Desk
content: The annual Ghoton Cup returns to London with clubs from Europe and beyond competing in a friendly atmosphere.
This year includes youth clinics and community meetups alongside the main fixtures.

title: Final selection of Tibetan National Football Team 2025
author: Coaching Staff
content: The final squad for 2025 blends experienced leaders with exciting young talents.
Training begins immediately with focus on fitness, tactics, and team cohesion.

title: TNSA Run Club launches new season
author: Community Programs
content: The TNSA Run Club opens registrations for all age groups with weekly sessions.
Runners of all abilities are welcome to join and build a healthy routine together.
